name: World_00
description:
The beta release of World_00! There are a few identified bugs in this version that might result in a crash of the game. To avoid them, avoid selecting a box that doesn't have a script attached to it, and do not press Tab during the introductory dialogue or during the credits. This is a beta, so these bugs will be resolved in future versions. We hope you enjoy it!

Love,

Gamebois (Abla Ghaleb, Lexi Stein, June Burkle, and Elena Felix)

P.S. Quit the application using Command + Q for Mac, and Alt + F4 for Windows! Escape will not work.
